children.value: The Future of Finance - All Welcome

Learning about MakerDAO and DeFi is easy, and getting in on the action with MakerDAO is easy. We are here to teach everything, from the basics of wallets to the details of Maker governance. Check out the links below to get started.
<Box sx={{backgroundColor:'primaryMuted', borderRadius:'12px', padding:'12px', display:'flex', flexDirection:'column', flexWrap:'wrap'}}>
Find out how to get & use Dai, a decentralized stablecoin
Learn how to mint new Dai with Maker Vaults
Find out how to use Maker to participate in MakerDAO governance
Get informed about off-chain and on-chain price oracles
Learn How to Get Dai and Earn Interest with Maker Vaults
